featured.name: Areca Palm
featured.description: A popular indoor plant with feathery, arching fronds that thrive in indirect light.

featured.description: Low-maintenance plant with upright, sword-like leaves; great for air purification.

featured.name: Peace Lily
featured.description: Known for its white blooms and air-purifying qualities; ideal for shaded spaces.

featured.name: Fiddle Leaf Fig
featured.description: Trendy indoor tree with large, leathery leaves; prefers bright, indirect light.

featured.name: Spider Plant
featured.description: Easy to care for, with arching green leaves and baby plantlets.

featured.name: Aloe Vera
featured.description: Succulent with healing gel inside the leaves; needs minimal watering.

featured.name: Money Plant
featured.description: Believed to bring prosperity; grows well in water or soil.

featured.name: Rubber Plant
featured.description: Glossy-leaved houseplant that can grow quite tall with proper care.

featured.name: Boston Fern

featured.name: ZZ Plant
featured.description: Extremely hardy plant with shiny leaves; tolerates low light and neglect.

plant.name: Calathea Orbifolia
plant.description: Striking striped leaves that curl at night; perfect for low-light environments.

plant.name: Bird of Paradise
plant.description: Tropical plant with large leaves; makes a bold indoor statement.

plant.name: Chinese Evergreen
plant.description: Attractive variegated foliage; thrives even with minimal light and care.

plant.name: Jade Plant
plant.description: Symbol of good luck and prosperity; fleshy oval-shaped leaves.

plant.name: Philodendron Heartleaf
plant.description: Charming vine with heart-shaped leaves; great for hanging or shelves.

plant.name: Dracaena Marginata
plant.description: Spiky upright leaves with red edges; adds a sculptural look to interiors.

plant.name: Parlor Palm
plant.description: Compact palm ideal for corners and tabletops; thrives in low light.

plant.name: Oxalis Triangularis
plant.description: Also known as purple shamrock; its deep purple leaves fold up at night.

plant.name: Croton Petra
plant.description: Vivid multicolored leaves bring bold energy to indoor spaces.
